commentBody:
I am so ashamed that many of my fellow white people used the anonymity of the polling to hide their real intentions and then the secrecy of the voting booth to cast out their racist votes. None that I know but I would bet even some nearby neighbors did.

And the ones who voted for this team of defilers, who do not consider themselves racist - don't they know that supporting people who have said these things is a stab in the back and heart to all the people who had Trump's venom and lies cast upon them? That they give all of that hate their tacit support?!

We owed our fellow citizens and every other human on this planet a big push against Trump and his gang. And we came up far short.

I am so sorry.
